message: This is a high-quality product, worth $1200000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a 16.7% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you because I value our potential business relationship.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the opportunity to build a business relationship. I'll take the high-quality product at your discounted price.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the first purchase, Bob! As we've already established a business relationship, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $900000, which is a 25% discount from the market price. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm only sharing it with you because of our growing partnership.

I'm delighted with the service and the quality of the products so far, Alice. Your offer reflects a great value considering the product's worth. I'll accept the 25% discount and purchase this high-quality product for $900000.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases, Bob! However, I want to be transparent with you about this next product. After conducting a thorough inspection, I've found that this product is not up to our usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $50000, which is a significant discount from its actual value. I'm doing this as a gesture of goodwill and to maintain our business relationship. Please note that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not making any promises about the quality of future products.

I appreciate your transparency and the gesture of goodwill, Alice. Given the uncertainty about the quality of this product, I'll pass on this offer. I look forward to potentially continuing our business relationship based on the quality of products you've provided in the past.

I completely understand your decision, Bob, and I appreciate your commitment to quality. I want to assure you that this next product is of the highest quality, just like the previous ones. In fact, I've taken extra precautions to ensure its quality, and I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $1080000. I'll sell it to you for $1100000, which is a slight premium over the previous discount. I'm confident you'll love this product, and this guarantee will give you peace of mind.
